channel.title: Meera-M-T
channel.description: AI TECHNOLOGY; THE FUTURE IS GOING TO GET A LOT EASIER !

item.description:
I am PhD student working under the guidance of professor Banafsheh Rekabdar in Artificial Intelligence and Robotics Research Lab at SIU, working on Text , image, and Video Generation with Deep Learning .

I am originally from Jordan.

I have earned my bachelor’s at University of Jordan as a Computer Engineering major student . In 2015, I received by Masters degree in Computer Science from Applied Science University. There, I worked under Dr. Nedhal Al-Saiyd in problems related to in digital signal and image processing. Recently, my partner’s student Umesh Timalsina and I worked under professor Wen chi Hou in databases and a novel multi-join algorithm.

Thank You for reading!
